item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: wpafthemes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Why local US newspapers are sounding the alarm
item.dc:creator: wpafthemes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
In the Dynamic World of WordPress

In the dynamic world of WordPress, AF Themes stands as a beacon of innovation and excellence. Our popular themes CoverNews, Morenews, ChromeNews, Newsphere, and Shopical alongside our powerful plugins WP Post Author, Blockspare, and Elespare serve as the building blocks of your digital journey.

Were passionate about quality code and elegant design, ensuring your website creation is an effortless blend of sophistication and simplicity. With unwavering support from our dedicated team, youre never alone.

Morenews The Most Functional All-Purpose Theme

Morenews is a powerhouse of flexibility. Designed for all purposes from professional blogs to business websites and news portals it comes packed with layout options, custom widgets, and styling tools, making it a perfect fit for any niche.

CoverNews The Most Loved Theme

CoverNews is one of our most loved WordPress themes, known for its elegant design and flexible layout. Perfect for news, magazine, and blog websites, it offers a clean interface and user-friendly customization helping your stories shine beautifully online.

ChromeNews Trusted by the Most Users

ChromeNews is a favorite among thousands of WordPress users. With its sleek, modern look and performance-optimized design, its built for publishers who value speed, flexibility, and SEO excellence. A complete solution for online news and media sites.

Newsphere Dynamic and Engaging News Theme

With Newsphere, you get a dynamic news theme that blends creativity and clarity. Its elegant homepage sections, live preview customization, and responsive design make it a reliable choice for digital publishers and storytellers.

Shopical Elegant WooCommerce Theme

Shopical brings power and beauty to your eCommerce store. Fully integrated with WooCommerce, its a responsive and versatile theme that helps you build stunning online shops with ease perfect for growing your brand and sales.

WP Post Author Showcase Your Writers

Highlight your contributors effortlessly with WP Post Author. This simple yet effective plugin adds attractive author boxes to your posts, featuring photos, bios, and social links giving every story a personal touch.

Blockspare Expand the Power of Gutenberg

Blockspare enhances the Gutenberg editor with creative and customizable blocks. From post grids to sliders and banners, it empowers you to craft unique layouts without coding, bringing more freedom to your page design.

Elespare All-in-One Widget Toolkit for Elementor

Elespare adds advanced widgets and design elements for Elementor users. Build stylish hero banners, post carousels, and dynamic sections in minutes all with intuitive drag-and-drop control and pixel-perfect results.

Step-by-Step WordPress Website Setup: Using InstaWP & TemplateSpares Demo Library | No-Code Sites

A beautiful collection of Ready to Import Starter Sites with just one click. Get modern & creative websites in minutes!

Newspaper, Magazine, Blog, and eCommerce Ready

Forget About Starting From Scratch

Explore a world of creativity with 365+ ready-to-use website templates! From chic blogs to dynamic news platforms, engaging magazines, and professional agency websites find your perfect online space!

One Click Import: No Coding Hassle! Three Simple Steps

Embark on your website journey with simplicity and style. Follow these 3 easy steps to create your online masterpiece effortlessly

Explore Templates

One Click Import: No Coding Hassle!

Embark on your website journey with simplicity and style. Follow these three easy steps to create your online masterpiece effortlessly:

  1. Choose a Site Explore a rich selection of over 350+ pre-built websites. With a single click, import the one that resonates with your vision.
  2. Customize & Personalize Unleash your creativity! Tailor every element to design your site exactly as you imagine it.
  3. Publish & Go Live! Once your site looks perfect, its time to share it with the world in just minutes.

Join the AF Themes Family

Join the AF Themes family, where excellence meets ease. Explore the endless possibilities and embark on your web journey with us today.

Together, were shaping the future of the web.

In the Dynamic World of WordPress

In the vibrant WordPress ecosystem, AF Themes stands as a beacon of innovation and excellence. Our popular themes CoverNews, Morenews, ChromeNews, Newsphere, and Shopical alongside our powerful plugins WP Post Author, Blockspare, and Elespare serve as the building blocks of your digital journey.

Were passionate about quality code and elegant design, ensuring your website creation is an effortless blend of sophistication and simplicity. With unwavering support from our dedicated team, youre never alone.

Morenews The Most Functional All-Purpose Theme

Morenews is a powerhouse of flexibility. Designed for all purposes from professional blogs to business websites and news portals it comes packed with layout options, custom widgets, and styling tools, making it a perfect fit for any niche.

CoverNews The Most Loved Theme

CoverNews is one of our most loved WordPress themes, known for its elegant design and flexible layout. Perfect for news, magazine, and blog websites, it offers a clean interface and user-friendly customization helping your stories shine beautifully online.

ChromeNews Trusted by the Most Users

ChromeNews is a favorite among thousands of WordPress users. With its sleek, modern look and performance-optimized design, its built for publishers who value speed, flexibility, and SEO excellence. A complete solution for online news and media sites.

Newsphere Dynamic and Engaging News Theme

With Newsphere, you get a dynamic news theme that blends creativity and clarity. Its elegant homepage sections, live preview customization, and responsive design make it a reliable choice for digital publishers and storytellers.

Shopical Elegant WooCommerce Theme

Shopical brings power and beauty to your eCommerce store. Fully integrated with WooCommerce, its a responsive and versatile theme that helps you build stunning online shops with ease perfect for growing your brand and sales.

WP Post Author Showcase Your Writers

Highlight your contributors effortlessly with WP Post Author. This simple yet effective plugin adds attractive author boxes to your posts, featuring photos, bios, and social links giving every story a personal touch.

Blockspare Expand the Power of Gutenberg

Blockspare enhances the Gutenberg editor with creative and customizable blocks. From post grids to sliders and banners, it empowers you to craft unique layouts without coding, bringing more freedom to your page design.

Elespare All-in-One Widget Toolkit for Elementor

Elespare adds advanced widgets and design elements for Elementor users. Build stylish hero banners, post carousels, and dynamic sections in minutes all with intuitive drag-and-drop control and pixel-perfect results.

item.title: We Craft Awesome Themes for WordPress
item.dc:creator: wpafthemes@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
100K+ Websites

Powered by AF themes

4.9 Rated

Loved by WordPress Users

#1 in Design

Top Layouts, Every Time

Free & Pro Plans

Flexibility for Every Need

WordPress Proud

Giving Back to the Community

The theme with the most informative homepage

@gammacepheus

I was looking for a theme for an informational website that would display as much content as possible on the homepage. In the end, it can show 22 links to posts at the top of the screen.. 

EXCELLENT !!! I love this theme. Es MUY bueno MoreNews

@gomezfiori

Llevo usndolo varios meses y ha resultado muy amigable, rpido y flexible. La posibilidad de armar la portada con widgets es genial, pero hay mucho ms. Realmente funciona. Lo recomiendo.. 

Suits best my needs

@wujanowski

My theme of choice. Have used it before 5 years long (with different hosting and domain). Now revived the blog and MoreNews is still my favorite 

Key features about AF themes

Accessibility Ready

Built with accessibility in mind, ensuring an inclusive experience for all users.

SEO Ready

Optimized for search engines, ensuring your content gets the visibility it deserves.

Translation ready

Our theme is ready to be translated into any language

One Click Demo Import

Effortlessly set up your site with our one-click demo import get started in seconds!

Responsive Design

Delight your mobile users with a seamless and personalized experience as they explore.

Clean Code

Each line of code is carefully crafted and designed to be adaptable to your needs.

Popular Page Builders & Plugins Integration

Seamlessly integrates with popular page builders, giving you the freedom to design without limits.Fully compatible with essential plugins to enhance functionality and extend your site's capabilities.

Compatible with Gutenberg for seamless block-based content creation

Fully compatible with Elementor for easy drag-and-drop site building.

Works seamlessly with Beaver Builder for flexible and intuitive page design

Optimized for WooCommerce to build your online store effortlessly

Compatible with Yoast for enhanced SEO optimization.

Fully compatible with Weglot for effortless multilingual site creation.

Compatible with Contact Form 7 for simple form creation.

Compatible with Jetpack to boost performance and security.

News & Media

For blogs, magazines, and news sites.

View Demo

Business & eCommerce

Updates about companies and industries.

View Demo

Technology & Innovation

Cover tech, apps, and inventions.

View Demo

Education & Non-Profit

Stories about schools and charities.

View Demo

Regional & Local News

Focus on local stories or languages.

View Demo

Lifestyle & Personal

Share fashion, travel, or daily life.

View Demo

Design & Creative

Showcase art, design, or creative work.

View Demo

Specialty & Niche

For hobbies or specific interests.

View Demo

Get Awesome Starter sites with one click demo import

The theme is a flexible, multipurpose theme compatible with page builders like Elementor, and Gutenberg, and its customizer also supports popular plugins

Watch Videos

Header Builder

  • Easy Customization Header layouts
  • Drag-and-drop Header Builder with real-time visual preview
  • Customize headers for the Homepage, posts, archives, or any page
View Demo Templates

Footer Builder

  • Easy Customization Footer layouts
  • Drag-and-drop Footer Builder with real-time visual preview
  • Customize footer for the Homepage, posts, archives, or any page
View All Widgets

Earn Money Online through Advertisements and Affiliate Marketing.

You can boost your earnings by leveraging ads or affiliate links. This theme is optimized with ample space for placing advertisements or affiliate links, allowing you to easily insert your ad codes or links and start generating additional income.

Advertisement

SEO-Optimized for top search rankings.

Designed for Google Rich Results, structured data, and SEO plugins, this theme optimizes your site for higher search rankings and visibility.

SEO Optimized Theme

Built for fast loading and high-traffic sites

Weve dedicated significant time to optimizing the speed of this theme, ensuring it loads quickly and remains fully optimized for all search engines.

Speed Test Example

Build an online shopping site with WooCommerce.

The theme is fully compatible with WooCommerce, making it easy to build and manage your online shop. With seamless integration, you can set up an attractive and functional eCommerce site, allowing you to showcase products, manage inventory, and streamline the shopping experience for your customers.

  • Compactable design for Product block
  • Variable, External/Affiliate Product Supported
  • Theme layout design for the Cart Page and Checkout page
Pre-made Demo Design

SEO-Optimized Elementor Addons for Blogs and Magazines.

The theme includes a powerfulEleSpareplugin for Blog, Magazine, and Newspaper add-ons of Elementor Page Builder, offering over 350+ Pro Template Kits and more than 35+ customizable elements.

Explore Elespare

Starter Templates Libary

Effortlessly Import Templates for Blogs, Magazines, News, eCommerce, and Business Sites with just one click.

View Starter Templates

Gutenberg Blocks & Patterns for Blogs, Magazines, Business Sites

The Blockspare plugin enhances the WordPress editing experience, particularly for Gutenberg users, by offering a variety of custom blocks that add flexibility to layout and design.

Explore Blockspare

Boost Revenue & Grow Email Lists

Use our theme alongside the Popup Maker plugin to create powerful, conversion-focused campaigns that drive revenue and grow email lists on WordPress websites.

Demos of Popup

Post Author Box

The Post Author Box module offers flexible options, including a customizable section title, content alignment (left, right, or center), and adjustable profile image shapes.

Author Post Box

Engage visitors with dynamic, feature-rich tables.

Enhance your website using the TablePress plugin with engaging, feature-rich tables that your visitors will love! Effortlessly create and manage modern data tables of any size, adding interactivity with live sorting, pagination, and search functionality.

Demos of Table

Create Your Dream Website in Minutes

Download, Import, Personalize, Go Live Simple Steps!

Build an Accessibility Ready WordPress Newspaper Site 2025

Ready to kickstart your news, blog, or magazine website effortlessly? With MoreNews, you can get your site live in just a few minutes using our one-click demo import feature!

WordPress Tutorials for Beginners 2025 - Full Tutorials

With MoreNews, you can get your website live in just a few minutes by importing a demo with just one click! In this video we show you how to import a demo website with MoreNews.

Wix vs WordPress 2025: 5 Key Advantages & Easy Website Building Tips

In this video, we'll dive into the top 4-5 reasons why WordPress stands out as the superior platform for website creation. From flexibility to customization, learn how WordPress can take your website to the next level.

User Registration Form Builder

The User Registration Form Builder allows you to create and manage multiple registration forms for your website. Easily add, update, or delete forms using the Registration Forms admin menu, providing a seamless way to handle user registrations.

Multiple Authorship Management

Easily manage co-authors and guest authors for individual posts with the Multiple Authorship feature. Add, update, or remove registered users and guest authors using the Authors meta box for authors and the Guest Authors admin menu for guest contributors.

Post Rating and Review System

Designed for Google Rich Results, structured data, and SEO plugins, this theme optimizes your site for higher search rankings and visibility.

Top Rated Post Feature

WP Post Authors Top Rated Post feature highlights the highest-rated content across your site, including individual authors best-performing posts

Recommended Posts

The Recommended Posts feature analyzes individual user preferences to suggest posts that match their interests. It uses factors like post categories, tags, and authorship to provide personalized content recommendations, enhancing user engagement and retention.

Multi-lingual demos with RTL Support

Our theme offers multi-lingual demos with full RTL (Right-to-Left) language support, allowing you to easily create websites in various languages, including Arabic, Hebrew, and more

Fast and Friendly Support

Experience top-tier customer service with our fast and friendly support team. Were here to assist you with any questions or issues, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience while using our products

Google Translate Your Site

The GTranslate plugin allows your website to be effortlessly translated into multiple languages using online sources. With full compatibility and support from our theme, you can easily reach a global audience, providing a seamless multilingual experience for your visitors without any complex setup required.
